events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected and I would like to return it.
The issue has been identified as a refund request related to product return by the support system.
Support agent Jessica has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request and will follow up shortly.
Hello! My name is Jessica. Iâ€™m here to help with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return?
To process your refund, I need the order number and more details about why you wish to return the product.
The order number is 789456123. The product does not match the description online, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the information. I have processed your refund request. Please ship the product back using the prepaid return label which I just emailed to you.
Thanks for your quick help, I have received the return label and will send the product back as soon as possible.
We have confirmed receipt of the returned product and initiated your refund. You should see the amount credited to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received properly. Please let us know if you have any further questions or concerns.
Since your refund has been successfully processed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
